product_name: Marmot Vagabond Rain Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Delivering reliable protection from rain and wind, the Marmot Vagabond rain jacket helps you endure all types of harsh weather without losing your cool-or your warmth, we should say. Lightweight nylon fabric with waterproof, breathable Gore-Tex(R) laminate blocks rain and wind; polyester mesh lining enhances breathability and stays soft next to skin. Seams are 100% sealed for complete protection. Underarm zippers provide immediate ventilation when you start to overheat. Marmot Vagabond jacket features an adjustable storm hood that stows inside the collar; zippered hand pockets; zippered interior pocket. Closeout.
short_description: Delivering reliable protection from rain and wind, the Marmot Vagabond rain jacket helps you endure all types of harsh weather without losing your cool-or your warmth, we should say.
